mapper.insert: insert into public.products (id, code, name, product_available, unit_price, quantity_per_unit, sizes, color, unit_weight, unit_in_stock, unit_on_order, discount_available, discount, ranking, note, is_active, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, supplier_id, category_id, picture ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productAvailable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{quantityPerUnit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sizes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{unitInStock,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{unitOnOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discountAvailable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ranking,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picture,jdbcType=BINARY} )
